scriptLines:
query: 'SELECT 
    order_id            AS NoFactura,
    pizza_id            AS CodInventario,
    name                AS Descripcion,
    category            AS Categoria,
    size                AS Tamano,
    quantity            AS Cantidad,
    date                AS Fecha,
    time                AS Hora,
    price               AS PrecioUnitario,
    quantity * price    AS Total
FROM dbo.tbl_ventas_pizzas
WHERE order_id IS NOT NULL
',
